solve

public Assignment solve(CSP csp)
Starts with a constraint propagation if AC-3 is enabled and then calls the super class implementation.

Overrides:
solve in class BacktrackingStrategy
Parameters:
csp - a CSP to solve
Returns:
a solution to the specified CSP, which specifies values for all the variables such that the constraints are satisfied.

inference

protected DomainRestoreInfo inference(Variable var,
                                      Assignment assignment,
                                      CSP csp)
Primitive operation, which tries to prune out values from the CSP which are not possible anymore when extending the given assignment to a solution.

Overrides:
inference in class BacktrackingStrategy
Returns:
An object which provides informations about (1) whether changes have been performed, (2) possibly inferred empty domains , and (3) how to restore the domains.
